strings.evolution:
Peace attained through sacrificing
the weak is laughable.
strings.affinity:
You and I are one and the same.
Let us continue to have
each other's backs.
strings.description: A young man spoken of in stories from the faraway land of Eos. Libertus is a member of the Kingsglaive, a special task force entrusted with protecting King Regis, ruler of the magic-sustained Kingdom of Lucis. His best friend is Nyx, and they both happen to be from the village of Galahd. Once the Kingdom of Lucis agreed to the ceasefire treaty proposed by the Empire of Niflheim demanding that King Regis cede all his lands save for the crown city of Insomnia to the Empire, Libertus's love for his homeland would not permit him to remain idle.
strings.fusion:
I cannot just sit back and smile as
someone throws away their homeland.

strings.evolution:
I will bring back peace to my homeland.
That is what we have been fighting for.
strings.affinity:
You and I are one and the same.
Let us continue to have
each other's backs.
strings.description: A young man spoken of in stories from the faraway land of Eos. Libertus is a member of the Kingsglaive, a special task force entrusted with protecting King Regis, ruler of the magic-sustained Kingdom of Lucis. Although he is upbeat and outspoken by nature, he takes his responsibilities very seriously. Extremely attached to his remote home of Galahd, he begins doubting his place in the Kingsglaive after learning that his village will fall under the control of the Empire of Niflheim following the new conditions of the proposed ceasefire.
strings.fusion: From now on, I'll fight how I wanna fight!
strings.summon:
I have something I wish to protect.
It's alright, I can still help you all.

strings.affinity:
You and I are one and the same.
Let us continue to have
each other's backs.
strings.description: A young man spoken of in stories from the faraway land of Eos. Libertus is a member of the Kingsglaive, a special task force entrusted with protecting King Regis, ruler of the magic-sustained Kingdom of Lucis. He is originally from the remote village of Galahd, and the roots to his home run deep. Nyx, a talented fighter and also member of the Kingsglaive, is a loyal friend whom he trusts completely. Crowe, on the other hand, is someone he treats more like a younger sibling. Sometimes he is so overprotective of her that she openly voices her frustrations with his attitude.
strings.fusion:
For the pride of my homeland!
I've still got a lot to give!
strings.summon:
Yo.
Might you be the hero of this world?
